text: Cafaggio is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Campiglia Marittima, province of Livorno.Statuto comunale di Campiglia Marittima, Art. 2 At the time of the 2011 census its population was 407. Cafaggio is about 70 km from Livorno and 3 km from Campiglia Marittima. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Cafaggio, Campiglia Marittima
